Class Utility

java.lang.Object
  Utility

public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object

A class that contains utility methods that all the other classes can use.

Author:
Ben Trivett

HexToBinary

public static java.lang.String HexToBinary(java.lang.String hex)
Converts from a hex string to a 2's complement binary string.

Parameters:

Returns:
A string of binary of length 16 that represents the hexadecimal parameter.

Parameters:

isHexString

public static java.lang.Boolean isHexString(java.lang.String value)
Tests whether parameter value is a hexadecimal string or not.

Parameters:
value - The string that is going to be tested.
Returns:
A boolean true if the string is in all hex, or a false if the string is not.

BooleanToString

public static java.lang.String BooleanToString(java.lang.Boolean b)
Converts from a boolean to a single character string. 0 for false or 1 for true.

Parameters:
b - The boolean that will be converted to 0 or 1.
Returns:
A string that represents the boolean.

convertFromTwosComplement

public static java.lang.Integer convertFromTwosComplement(java.lang.Integer value)
Converts a decimal value that was in binary 2s complement to its correct decimal value.

Parameters:
value - The decimal value that is going to be converted.
Returns:
The correct decimal value that has been converted from twos complement binary.

Converts a decimal value that will be in binary 2s complement to its correct decimal value.

Parameters:
value - The decimal value that is going to be converted.
Returns:
The correct decimal value that will be converted into twos complement binary.
